# lowercased()

**Instance Method**

Returns a lowercase version of the string.

## Declaration

```swift
func lowercased() -> String
```

## Return Value

A lowercase copy of the string.

## Discussion

Here‚Äôs an example of transforming a string to all lowercase letters.

```swift
let cafe = "BBQ Caf√© üçµ"
print(cafe.lowercased())
// Prints "bbq caf√© üçµ"
```



## Changing Case

- **uppercased()**: Returns an uppercase version of the string.
